name: TERRACRXX
description:
Save Mother Earth from being Overrun by Zombies

Game play :-

You have 3 lives 

Upon touching Enemies or Falling off you lose a life

Game Ends either when you die or when you kill all the Enemies.

Controls :-

W,A,S,D keys to move , Space to Jump and Left Mouse Button to Shoot.

Objective :-

Complete the game without Dying.
